name: FillBlocksInWorld
description: Fills a rectangular area in the specified world with blocks. This is useful for creating terrain, buildings, or other structures.

parameters.name: world
parameters.description: The world object to fill blocks in

parameters.name: startPos
parameters.description: The starting position of the fill area (created with vec3())

parameters.name: endPos
parameters.description: The ending position of the fill area (created with vec3())

parameters.name: blockType
parameters.description: The type of block to place (defaults to 1)

returns.description: This function does not return a value

example:
-- Create a world and add a ground plane
local world = CreateWorld(32, 32)
FillBlocksInWorld(world, vec3(0, 0, 0), vec3(31, 1, 31))

-- Create a wall
FillBlocksInWorld(world, vec3(10, 2, 10), vec3(10, 5, 20))

-- Create a platform with specific block type
FillBlocksInWorld(world, vec3(5, 10, 5), vec3(15, 10, 15), 2)
notes: The fill operation includes both start and end coordinates
Block coordinates are inclusive on both ends
Use vec3() to create position vectors
Different block types may have different visual appearances
